title: Worked Solution
text:
To convert feet to kilometers, we can use the conversion factor: $$1$$ kilometer $$=$$ 3,281 feet.
So, to find the height of Mount Everest in kilometers, we can divide its height in feet by the conversion factor:
29,028 feet ÷ 3,281 $$ rac{feet}{kilometer}$$ $$=$$ $$8.848$$ kilometers
Therefore, the answer is $$8.847$$ km (rounded to three decimal places).
